CustomField.description: Accept Button Field for Lightning Component
CustomField.formula: IF(Quote_Type__c <> 'Direct CPQ', IF(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c = True && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM' && TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) != 'Accepted', ("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalAccept?id="&Id),IF(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c = True && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM' && TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) != 'Accepted',(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalAccept?id="&Id),NULL)), IF(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c = True && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM' && TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Approved', ("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalAccept?id="&Id),IF(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c = True && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM' && TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Approved',(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalAccept?id="&Id),NULL)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Accept Button Field for Lightning Component
CustomField.label: Accept Button Field
